name: 2022 Fin Year USA Defence Budget Review
name_original: 2022 Fin Year USA Defence Budget Review
description:
In Financial Year 2021, it has been decided that next years US defence budget will be calculated by pitting accountants against each branch of the military in a series of war games.  The better the branch does, the bigger budget it gets.

You, as the military accountant, must keep the budget low, by kicking as much ass as ossible.

Xbox GamePad controller only right now!

v0.2 Released:

- Bugfix where game would crash in certain languages

- Volume set a bit lower

This is my entry into MonoGameJam3 - it was written from scratch in 9 days (I think?) - and it really shows.  I ran out of time, so there arent half the enemies I was hoping for, there is no gameplay balancing - hardly any game play at all to be honest.  You cant even lose - just keep playing!  Each level takes 1 minute to complete, there are 5 levels in total.
